description: Chocolate pudding with a twist. For an indulgent extra, serve these with a little scoop of dairy or dairy-free ice cream or whipped cream.
keywords: Pudding,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Wheat free,Egg free,Chocolate pudding,Low fat,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Adzuki Bean Chocolate Pudding With Fresh Raspberries Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl, whisk together the cornflour and 2 tablespoons of water. Set aside.
In a blender, purée the adzuki beans with 80ml of water and 120ml of the almond milk until smooth.
In a small saucepan, whisk together the remaining 120ml of almond milk, the vanilla bean paste, agave, cocoa powder, and puréed adzuki beans until completely smooth.

Heat the almond milk mixture over a low heat for 8–10 minutes until the mixture reaches a low simmer, stirring occasionally to avoid lumps. Remove from the heat and let sit at room temperature for 10 minutes.
Divide evenly among 6 serving cups, cover, and refrigerate overnight to set. Top each with a raspberry before serving.
